instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00840-a serial unavailable
threads.message:
this is a new board and its showing that serial number is unavailable i have removed and read bios, there is a serial number showing there, this is my first time writing serial number to this board, so i am getting bit confused, can someone write it for me? 
[url]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1l0GDO2FcOyQXRFFafD91HbA_K1qXsV-W/view?usp=sharing[/url]

threads.title: 820-00840-a serial unavailable
threads.message: Did someone reflash the BIOS, to change the serial?

threads.title: 820-00840-a serial unavailable
threads.message: no, that's how i got it from dealer through gsx parts exchange, its a brand new board.

threads.message: What serial number do you need in there?
